description: Wanted something to play old flash games and it did that well.
summary: Did what it was supposed to do

description:
I could not install package cause i got this error message:

error: Failed to install com.adobe.Flash-Player-Projector: Wrong size for extra data https://fpdownload.macromedia.com/pub/flashplayer/updaters/32/flash_player_sa_linux.x86_64.tar.gz
On battery life and resources. And it's a security risk. Go to HTML5!
As an independent player, it works correctly. I recommend it.
It is not Pepper Flash for the spicy websites.
Great for viewing flash files after the death of support in Chrome for sites like Newgrounds and Homestuck/MSPA.
It's over Johhny, it's over!
summary: Just die Flash, stop torturing us

description: Flash will wreck battery life and freeze up your browser. And add security holes.
Note this is the *standalone* version of Flash Player, so it's for playing swf files you have saved on your hard drive locally.

Why does this syphilis still exist? This is not something that I want on my computer, and I hate the fact that it is still a thing in 2020. It is like smoking; yes, a shrinking number of people still do it, but everyone knows it is one of the worst things that you can do. Adobe should get rid of this thing. It is like giving a dirty drifter a ride in a new BMW, do not do it. The current uses of Adobe flash are a list of things that would out kink fifty shades of gray. Why would I do that to my PC?
... no need for another Zombie.
Review bombers need to calm down, even if flash player isn't good many flash games and animations have been created over the last 2 decades that justifies this standalone flash player
just let it die.
summary: bruh adobe is still trying to make money out of this

description: stupid laggy and stuff and security risks

It nowadays is our only hope for playing Flash games that haven't been rereleased like The Henry Stickman Collection, and there are a lot of great ones on top of games so bad that they're good again. I personally use this to play BFDIA 5b, an "episode" of the long-running YouTube show Battle For Dream Island, and it's still a blast all these years later. As for the client, meh, apparently it doesn't install in Fedora, but it works just fine for me on KDE neon.
summary: People don't give Flash the reputation it deserves

description:
Crazy to me how people in this review section are attack a mere player and treating flash like its the plague. Old flash content isn't magically converted to work with html5. No matter how bad and flawed you think flash may be, there is no denying its importance in the history of the internet. This isn't "Adobe, Flash Player", it is "Adobe Flash, Player".

People(generally) aren't releasing new music on cassette tapes anymore, but does that mean that it is bad to still have functioning cassette player? Of course not.
summary: For when you need to play a flash file

description: uninstall it already
As always you need a flash player for all your flashy stuff fron internet to games, this one seems to work ok

I can't do anything about the flash games I can't download but at least I can play the ones I CAN download. This allows me to play even my most favorite downloadable flash games I used to play before Flash was killed. I can even play them offline, too and I'm happy about that!
will rate higher if it plays flash animations once I download some
why is this still here

i can't download this app 
where's the problem?
pls answr
Flash player isn't getting any updates anymore and shouldn't be used

Adobe Flash Player Projector es un reproductor de contenido creado en la plataforma Adobe Flash.
NOTA: Este contenedor no está verificado, afiliado ni respaldado por Adobe.
genial si les va lento es por su pc

description: Il y a certains outils pratiques sous forme de flash, même des petits jeux pour la majeure partie, avec ça on peut les ouvrir directement sans le navigateur.
